forecast.wind: West to southwest 3 to 5, perhaps briefly 6 mid-channel late afternoon, locally northwesterly in the far south of the area, generally decreasing 2 to 3 overnight, becoming variable tomorrow.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight with a low swell, increasing slight to moderate for a time today and tonight, perhaps briefly rather rough mid-channel.
forecast.weather: Small risk of mist near french coast around dawn.
forecast.visibility: Good, perhaps locally moderate or poor for a time.
